Description: EMI Offer - 10% up to Rs.500 OFF using HDFC Bank Credit Card EMI payment on net payable of Rs.3500 or more. Description: 10% up to Rs.400 OFF using HDFC Bank Diners Club Black/Biz Black Credit Card on net payable of Rs.3000 or more. Apply the coupon code HDFCDINERS to avail the offer; Offer available only for HDFC Bank Diners Club Black/Biz Black Credit Cardholders; Applicable twice per user per month; Transaction amount (after restaurant discounts) of Rs.3000 or more payable using HDFC Bank Diners Club Black/Biz Black Credit Card is eligible; Other T&Cs may apply; Offer valid till Oct 31, 2025 11:59 PM.
Eligible Credit Cards: HDFC Diners Club Black Credit Card,  HDFC Biz Black Metal Edition Credit Card

Description: 10% up to Rs.500 OFF using HDFC Bank Infinia Credit Card on net payable of Rs.3500 or more. Apply the coupon code HDFCINFINIA to avail the offer; Offer available only for HDFC Bank Infinia Credit Cardholders; Customer can avail the offer on their Infinia credit card (HDFCINFINIA & INFINIA1000) a total of 2 times per month; Transaction amount (after restaurant discounts) of Rs.3500 or more payable using HDFC Bank Infinia Credit Card is eligible; Other T&Cs may apply; Offer valid till Oct 31, 2025 11:59 PM.
Eligible Credit Cards: HDFC Bank Infinia Credit Card Metal Edition

Description: Get 10% cashback on all orders when you pay using Swiggy HDFC Bank Credit Card. Valid only on Swiggy HDFC Bank Credit Card; Applicable on a minimum net transaction value of Rs.100; Monthly cashback limit of Rs.1500 on Swiggy spends; Cashback will be processed in the next statement cycle; Other T&Cs may apply.
